Module io.netty5.transport.classes.epoll
Package io.netty5.channel.epoll

Class EpollServerSocketChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.util.DefaultAttributeMap
      • io.netty5.channel.AbstractChannel<P,​L,​R>
        • io.netty5.channel.epoll.AbstractEpollServerChannel<UnixChannel,​InetSocketAddress,​InetSocketAddress>
          • io.netty5.channel.epoll.EpollServerSocketChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, ChannelOutboundInvoker, ServerChannel, ServerSocketChannel, UnixChannel, AttributeMap, FuturePromiseFactory, Comparable<Channel>
    public final class EpollServerSocketChannel
extends AbstractEpollServerChannel<UnixChannel,​InetSocketAddress,​InetSocketAddress>
implements ServerSocketChannel
    ServerSocketChannel implementation that uses linux EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.netty5.channel.AbstractChannel
